body_html: @ilaripih If I use that linkopts and rebuild, it seems that the produced libtensorflow.so doens't contain the C API functions. I get "undefined reference" for TF_NewSession, TF_ExtendGraph etc. Is there a way to include the C API to the library, but still filter out libjpeg etc.?
body_text: @ilaripih If I use that linkopts and rebuild, it seems that the produced libtensorflow.so doens't contain the C API functions. I get "undefined reference" for TF_NewSession, TF_ExtendGraph etc. Is there a way to include the C API to the library, but still filter out libjpeg etc.?
body: @ilaripih If I use that `linkopts` and rebuild, it seems that the produced `libtensorflow.so` doens't contain the C API functions. I get "undefined reference" for `TF_NewSession`, `TF_ExtendGraph` etc. Is there a way to include the C API to the library, but still filter out `libjpeg` etc.?
